title: (Amazon 美國用戶請入) Refuse delivery

replies.msg:
我想係 Amazon cancel 一個 order，但係唔得

Amazon email 話：

You can track your package at any time. If you no longer want these items, you may refuse delivery or return them after they arrive. You can visit Your Orders to start a return.

有無人試過 refuse delivery? 會唔會有 full refund?
本身我揀左 free shipping
洗唔洗比運費?

我想係 Amazon cancel 一個 order，但係唔得

You can track your package at any time. If you no longer want these items, you may refuse delivery or return them after they arrive. You can visit Your Orders to start a return.

本身我揀左 free shipping
洗唔洗比運費?


你唔收咪會彈返返去
